MetaData.description: Checkdown is a simple markdown previewer that allows you to work on a checklist with your team in real-time.
MetaData.keywords: markdown, previewer, checklist, team, real-time, collaboration, workspace, invite, code, share, upload, search, source code, github, react, socket, open source

HomePage.description: is a simple markdown previewer that allows you to work on a checklist with your team in real-time.
HomePage.start_with: You can start with a markdown file, search for a public one, join an existing workspace with an invite code, or explore the market.
